thread.section_title: CheapOair.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CheapOair.ca | cheapoair.ca
thread.title: ROBERT ROSS

author: ROBERT ROSS
title: ROBERT ROSS
text:
A bit hesitant in booking a flight but decided to go ahead on the phone
and NOT online. Got a great guy who was complete and very efficient.
Booked all the seats from Ottawa to Palermo Sicily via Montreal and Zurich with the exception of the two Air Canada legs to and from Ottawa/Montreal.
What more would one expect but not to be able to select seating on the easiest part of the trip. No problem with either Swiss Air or Lufthansa but Air Canada must still be in the 90's with paper and pencil.
Come on Justin , live up to the Trudeau name - modernize the country!
